projects.name: Weather App
descriptions: An application made with React, Node, Express, and OpenWeather APIâ€”a simple app that shows the current and forecasted weather within the next seven days of a city.

projects.name: Inventory Management System (WIP)
projects.tech: MongoDB, Express, React, and Node JS
descriptions: An application wherein a user can keep track their inventory
Front-end client is made with React, Redux-Toolkit, ReduxSaga, Axios, Typescript and uses Material UI
Back-end server is a REST API made with Node JS, Express, Passport, JWT, TypeScript, and MongoDB for data storage, and is currently deployed and running on Heroku.
